author: @harshalbora8981
text: People getting empty csv files and warnings like ''FutureWarning: elementwise comparison failed; returning scalar instead, but in the future will perform elementwise comparison' at line ''row=sp500[(sp500.index==sp500_date)]', replace that line with ''row=sp500.loc[sp500['Date']==sp500_date]' and try again

author: @zwang5472
text: problem with your percentage change: should be like this: starting_sp500_value = sp500_value sp500_value = float(row["Adjusted_Close"]) ... sp500_p_change = (sp500_value-starting_sp500_value)/starting_sp500_value

author: @bruete6
text: percentage change should be "similar" to derivative.  When you calculate the percentage change, the old value is a fixed value, which is the price of the earliest one.  It makes sense to me that percentage change = (today  price -  newest last price)/newest last price. Basically,  update the old price in file loop.
